Given square $ ABCD$ with side $ 8$ feet.  A circle is drawn through vertices $ A$ and $ D$ and tangent to side $ BC.$  The radius of the circle, in feet, is:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 4 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 4 \sqrt{2} \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 5 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 5 \sqrt{2} \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 6$
